**🆘 High Threat Security Alert: Google Chrome🆘**

Recently Google has released an emergency security update as it confirms that attackers are already exploiting a high severity zero-day vulnerability「CVE-2022-1096」.To avoid your 🦊**Metamask wallet **being hacked,we would like to remind our bearo brothers and sisters to update your Chrome browser immediately:
👇🏻Steps to update your Google Chrome：
1️⃣Open Chrome
2️⃣Click**[More]** on top right corner of your browser
3️⃣Select (Help), then Click **[About Google Chrome]**
4️⃣Click **[Update Google Chrome]**(You will not find this button if you are using the latest version)
5️⃣Click **[Relaunch]**, ensure you have your Chrome is updated to** ▶️99.0.4844.84◀️**

⚠️If you are using other **Chromium **web browsers (**eg. Brave、Edge**), please check and ensure you have updated to the latest version and restart the browser to ensure you are surfing online with the updated version ! Protect your assets⚠️


**🆘Chrome瀏覽器高危保安警報🆘**

Google 稍早正式釋出**Chrome**瀏覽器桌面版本「99.0.4844.84」的安全更新，被發現代號為零日漏洞「CVE-2022-1096」，為避免🦊**Metamask (小狐狸錢包)**遭漏洞攻擊，請各位熊弟熊妹務必盡快更新瀏覽器版本！

**👇🏻Chrome瀏覽器桌面版本更新步驟如下：**
1️⃣在電腦上開啟Chrome
2️⃣按一下右上方的**[更多]**圖示 
3️⃣依序按一下(說明) **[關於Google Chrome]**
4️⃣按一下**[更新Google Chrome]**(重要資訊：如果找不到這個按鈕，表示您目前使用的是最新版本)
5️⃣按一下**[重新啟動]**，並查看是否已更新至最新版本▶️**99.0.4844.84**◀️

⚠️除此之外，如各位是用** Chromium**為核心的瀏覽器（如 **Brave、Edge** 等），請一併檢查是否已更新至最新版本，並在安裝更新完成後，重新啟動瀏覽器以利啟動更新後版本，以防駭客趁虛而入⚠️

**⚠️Alert: Please update your Chrome Browser⚠️**

Just a few days ago, Google has released an emergency safety update「99.0.4844.84」to Desktop **Chrome ** browser, however, they have identified another new hack 「 CVE-2022-1232 」with a “High” threat level. The vulnerability would allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the target system.

We would like to urge our bearo brothers and sister to update your browser immediately to avoid Malicious code attack by Hackers.

👇🏻Steps to update your **Google Chrome**：
1️⃣Open **[Chrome]**
2️⃣Click **[More]** on top right corner of your browser
3️⃣Select (Help), then Click **[About Google Chrome]**
4️⃣Click **[Update Google Chrome]**(You will not find this button if you are using the latest version)
5️⃣Click **[Relaunch]**, ensure you have your Chrome is updated to**▶️100.0.4896.75◀️**

Meanwhile, if you are using other **Windows**, **Mac** and **Linux** with **Chromium** web browsers (**eg. Brave/Edge**), please conduct a check manually to ensure your browser is updated to the latest version. Lastly, please check manually to ensure your browser is updated to the latest version.

**⚠️Chrome瀏覽器更新提醒⚠️**

Google稍早釋出**Chrome**瀏覽器桌面版本「99.0.4844.84」的安全更新，再次被發現存在漏洞「 CVE-2022-1232」，遠端使用者可利用此漏洞，於目標系統觸發遠端執行任意程式碼。
為避免遭受駭客注入惡意代碼，請各位熊弟熊妹務必盡快更新瀏覽器版本！

**👇🏻Chrome瀏覽器桌面版本更新步驟如下：**
1️⃣在電腦上開啟**[Chrome]**
2️⃣按一下右上方的**[更多]**圖示 
3️⃣依序按一下(說明) **[關於Google Chrome]**
4️⃣按一下**[更新Google Chrome]**(重要資訊：如果找不到這個按鈕，表示您目前使用的是最新版本)
5️⃣按一下**[重新啟動]**，並查看是否已更新至最新版本▶️**100.0.4896.75**◀️

除此之外，如各位是用**Windows、Mac 和 Linux**系統及**Chromium**為核心的瀏覽器（如 **Brave、Edge** 等），請一併手動檢查是否已更新至最新版本，並在安裝更新完成後，重新啟動瀏覽器以利啟動更新後版本，以防駭客趁虛而入！

🐻**Bearos, let’s come and sing! **

We know all of you have your favorite Chinese Pop songs from the 90s. It’s time to refresh those memories.
39 years ago, the legendary rock Band **"Beyond"** was formed in Hong Kong and had a huge impact on Mandopop. **Paul Wong** - the former lead guitarist of Beyond is now bringing Rock Music into the future of Web3 via NFTs. This Saturday, Vicky (the operations lead of Mr. Paul Wong’s upcoming NFT project, #HMX Music) will be joining us and sharing some of the greatest Mandopop hits from the 90s. 
**Perhaps, we should have our event host Mr. Ling perform for us the "Boundless Oceans, Vast Skies"**.🤙 🤙 🤙

**🐻PhantaBear x Alpacadabraz🦙The Voice of nature Singing Battle 2022 - Team PhantaBear Internal Selection begins!**

Here is a singing battle in the forest between Team Alpacadabraz and Team PhantaBear, we are excited to see who will be winning this **"Voice of nature Singing Battle"**!
Seeded singers, it is your chance to sing and represent Team PhantaBear for this singing battle
Demo screening will be conducted and 10 candidates will be shortlisted to be the finalist in this single battle. Professional training by experts in the Music industry will be offered to the finalists on song selection and equipment recommendations, similar experience to a professional singer getting ready for a contest.

🎤**Event Rundown**
<t:1650954060:D> - <t:1651818060:D>: Demo submission
<t:1652163660:D>: Finalist announcement (10 singers will be selected by professional judges for the finals)
<t:1652250060:D>: Song selection and equipment recommendations
<t:1652422860:D>: Rehearsal
<t:1652509260:D>: Finals (5 singers will be selected by professional judges and holders to represent the PHBC externally)
**How to Enter**
From now on until <t:1651852740:F>,record a Demo（MP3 format) and upload to <#968435624577224734>
**Rules and Regulations**
a.  Your Demo should be limited to 3 minutes or less
b.  There is on limit on participant count per entry, it can be solo, choir or vocal group
c.  You are free to use any recording requirement to submit your entry (the submission will need to be in mp3 format)
d.  Ghosting is strictly prohibited

**⚠️Please note**⚠️
a. This activity is available to #PhantaBear holders only.
b. The Organizer reserves the right to disqualify any entrant who it believes has breached any of these rules and regulations.
c. The organizers reserve the right to amend, change, cancel or re-define the event as required.

⭐️**Judicial panel and their profile**
**Mr. Ling Wai Man｜Music producer/Songwriter/backing vocalist**
He participated in the album production, singing, chorus writing, and recording of singers such as Wakin Chau, Jacky Cheung, Leo Ku, Eason Chan, A-Lin, etc. and published a good amount of popular pieces. He is the designated concert harmony coordinator for the concert tours of Jay Chou. 
**Mr. AK｜Music Director & professional guitarist**
The guitarist of music band <Starry eyes> since 1983. He has been in the music industry for more than 36 years and collaborated with a lot of very famous singers, including Simon Hsueh, Chyi Yu, Lo Ta-yu, Shunza, Sky Wu, Chang Shin-che, Jay Chou, etc. He has also been appointed as the Music Jury of Golden Melody Awards.

<t:1650954060:D> - <t:1651818060:D> ： Demo 徵選

<t:1652250060:D>：專人指導建議 (硬體設備＆選曲)
<t:1652422860:D>：彩排

⭐️**師資與評審陣容**
**凌偉文老師｜音樂製作人、詞曲創作人、合聲老師**
曾與周華健、張學友、鄭中基、古巨基、陳奕迅、ALin​​等實力派歌手合作，創作過《你最珍貴》、《許願》、《一個人生活》《相思無用》、《被愛是幸福》等膾炙人口的歌曲，更是周杰倫巡迴演唱會指定和聲統籌。
**AK老師｜音樂總監、職業吉他手**
從1983年成立幻眼合唱團擔任吉他手至今，和音樂相伴至少 36 個年頭，合作過的藝人更是不計其數，包括：薛岳、齊豫、羅大佑、順子、伍思凱、張信哲和周杰倫，更曾擔任台灣金曲獎的評審。

Ajoe阿九是为NFT新手赋能和进阶防被割韭菜的社区PFP项目。发行方NFT阿尔法社区是知名中文NFT社区。持有人将享有社区自主开发的各种市场分析工具，白单抽奖平台，研究报告等各种赋能。
 
NFT Aerfa 是领先的 NFT 中文发行社区，他们帮助第三方艺术家/IP所有者发布他们的NFT收藏，并提供智能合约开发/营销/社区建设服务。NFT 阿尔法社区为 NFT 爱好者提供项目分析、防诈骗指导、专业工具开发等各项服务，提倡社群互 助 + 社交娱乐 + 合作共赢的社区文化，帮助每个社区成员与 NFT 市场共同成长。
 
Ajoe白单为NFT Aerfa社区发行的第三个项目 Discord: https://discord.gg/ajoe
阿尔法社区已经成功的发行两个项目分别为Fortune Dao Genesis（财神道）
NFT Aerfa Twitter: https://twitter.com/NFT_Aerfa
和Zenlicious（一膳斋）
Fortune Dao Genesis OpenSea: https://opensea.io/collection/fortune-dao-genesis
Zenlicious OpenSea: https://opensea.io/collection/zenlicious

**Meet Team PhantaBear’s semi-final candidates from “The Voice of nature Singing Battle 2022” co-hosted by 🐻PhantaBear x 🦙Alpacadabraz x 🐶FOMO DOG**

**Mr. Ling Wai Man and Mr. AK have been reviewing the demos submitted by all the candidates. After careful consideration, 10 candidates have been selected to enter the semi-finals.**

Please refer to the list below and check out the comments given by our judges:

<@586018058532028416>
Song: 會呼吸的痛｜Fish Leong
She has a very comforting voice and a calming tone. The true-false sound conversion and the Aspirated and Unaspirated Sound conversion was seamless.

<@187438741785149441>
Song: What brings me to you｜Ann
Very confident voice and matched very well with the piano.

<@914472774473486366>
Song: Against the light｜Stefanie Sun
The way DoDohow sing can picture the song's message with her voice, moving from darkness to light.

<@697854261798633482>
Song: Mystery of Love｜Sufjan Stevens
Formerchild performed this song with a very sensitive and delicate voice texture, and you can feel the emotion behind it. Great harmony. You can feel the atmosphere of the music through the guitar playing.

<@706432284751953963>
Song: 自創曲｜jojobaoil
Singing while playing guitar is not easy, Jojobaoil had a powerful voice, full of passion and good rhythm.

<@261483092227784705>
Song: Speechless｜Lady Gaga
Magz’s voice was quite laid back but with attitude. You can feel the sense of despair behind the song's character.

<@918439253216735242>
Song: Sunday Morning ｜Maroon 5
parametrick99 sings with an emotional tone of voice.It was an impressive singing accompanied by instruments，the change of rhythm has been handled very well.

<@905151520478208070>
Song: Song: 黑色幽默｜Jay Chou
Sax has a husky voice，and easily picture the emotions of the song.

<@402746247791902721>
Song: 從前說｜小阿七
The singing would remind us about our life from high school, with approachable tone of voice (The rhythm was contradicting with the piano otherwise it would have been better).

<@826302154759077918>
Song: 紅豆｜Faye Wong
A very sweet and soft voice，her voice reminded us about Teresa Teng and Faye Wong, you feel the warmth from her performance.

It was a tough mission to select the ten candidates for the semi-finals, Mr. AK and I have spent hours discussing and we did scoring individually for all the submissions based on the voice, intonation, rhythm as well as emotions of the demos. For those of you that didn’t make it to the semi-final this time, don’t give up and we will be organizing more of these singing events with other communities in the future. We can’t wait to hear you sing again.**☺️

**2022 🐻PhantaBear x 🦙Alpacadabraz x 🐶FOMO DOG 聲林之王歌唱爭霸賽 -「聲林之熊內部爭霸賽」入圍名單滾燙出爐！**

❤️**感謝凌老師與AK老師的用心評選，恭喜以下10位入圍本次比賽的熊熊歌手🎉！ (排名不分先後，內含老師們的專業點評內容)**
<@586018058532028416>
演唱歌曲：會呼吸的痛|梁靜茹
聲音的Tone很舒服，真假音、氣音轉換非常順暢，有被療癒的感覺。

<@187438741785149441>
演唱歌曲：是什麼讓我遇見這樣的你｜白安
對自己的歌聲很有自信，搭配鋼琴伴奏恰到好處。

<@914472774473486366>
演唱歌曲：逆光｜孫燕姿
能唱出歌曲本身的畫面，有從黑暗走向光明的感覺。

<@697854261798633482>
演唱歌曲：Mystery of Love｜Sufjan Stevens
聲音質感很細膩、敏感，能感受到豐富的情感。和聲優美，吉他伴奏恰如其分，能完全表現出歌曲的氛圍。

<@706432284751953963>
演唱歌曲：自創曲｜jojobaoil
彈唱自如，歌聲瀟灑有爆發力，節奏掌握精準。

<@261483092227784705>
演唱歌曲：Speechless｜Lady Gaga
聲線慵懶但有態度，頗能表達歌詞裡女主角對另一半的絕望感。

<@918439253216735242>
演唱歌曲：Sunday Morning ｜Maroon 5
Emotional tone of voice. 表達富有情緒，聲音抓耳，讓人意猶未盡。彈唱俱佳，從慢板到快板的節奏都能掌握自如。

<@905151520478208070>
演唱歌曲：黑色幽默｜周杰倫
聲線渾厚有畫面感，能輕易把人帶入悲傷的情緒當中。

<@402746247791902721>
演唱歌曲：從前說｜小阿七

<@826302154759077918>
演唱歌曲：紅豆｜王菲
歌聲甜美，像王菲和鄧麗君的綜合體，讓人感覺溫暖並且如沐春風。

👀**Preview of "The Voice of nature Singing Battle 2022" - Season Final**
**"The Voice of nature Singing Battle 2022" - Season Final **will be hosted in the **PhantaBear Community**. **New NFT Scam on OpenSea 📢 **
Please be aware of any NFT airdrop from unknown collections into your wallet. Those NFT collections may not be legitimate. The hackers will provide you with a tempting WETH offer, and once you click on their proposal, it gives them full access and control over every NFT in your wallet. This new NFT scam started happening after OpenSea made their code public!


**注意 📢 OpenSea 上的新型騙局**
請注意任何未知的NFT空投到你的錢包中，這很有可能是不合法的項目。駭客可能向你提供誘人的WETH報價，一旦你進行點擊，他們將可能控制你錢包中的NFT資產並進行轉移。這有可能是OpenSea公開代碼後產生的漏洞。

🎨**2022 PhantaBear Fashion Design Awards**🖌️

Dear Bearos,

We sincerely invite all the talented and artistic Bearos to join our very first fashion design competition to customize clothing and accessories exclusively for PhantaBear designs. Let's see your cool, stylish and confident clothing designs for our Bearos.

We are also delighted to announce that Ric, the director of the trendy brand **PHANTACi**, and **Daniel Wong**, an internationally renowned designer, will act as judges to help us identify the rising star of fashion design from the PhantaBear community. What makes it even more exciting is that the total prize money could reach up to approximately USD$4,000. Bearos, pitch your creative idea and see if you’ll win one of the awards!


✨ **Qualification**
All contestants and voters MUST be PhantaBear or PhancyPets’ holders.

✨**Awards and Prizes**
**Special Jury Prize**：1ETH + 8% of Clothing Sales Profit

**Popularity Award**
1st Place：0.5 ETH + 8% of Clothing Sales Profit
2nd Place：0.3 ETH + 8% of Clothing Sales Profit
3rd Place：0.2 ETH + 8% of Clothing Sales Profit
4th Place ：Phancy Pets * 1
5th Place：Phancy Pets * 1

✨**Timeline**
6/2-6/21    ｜Entry Submission
6/22-6/28 ｜Judging & Scoring
6/29            ｜Finalists Annoucement
6/29-7/3    ｜Bearo’s Voting
7/4               ｜Winners Announcement

✨**How to apply ?**
1. Please design the t-shirt, hoodie, socks, hat based on the pattern provided: https://reurl.cc/LmnV04
2. File Naming: Discord User Name_Category  e.g. Sam#2223_Hoodie
3. Participants can send multiple submissions.
4. Please upload your work by filling out the form: https://forms.gle/ag6AvXutCYwYUKZu7

✨**Judging Criteria**
Based on the following criteria, the jury selects 10 outstanding pieces that are innovative and visually aesthetic for popular vote.

- Theme 30%
- Innovation 30%
- Aesthetics 20%
- Artist Statement 10 %
- Completeness 10%

👀 **Please note:**
1. Freehand drawing is acceptable. Feel free to let your imagination run wild and create anything you want with your design.
2. Participants can send multiple submissions. Submissions that do not meet the provided format may be rejected.
3. Each participant can only win one award at most. As such, the recipient of the Special Jury Prize will not qualify for the Popularity Award. In the case that the recipient of the Special Jury Prize is also one of the top 5 winners of the Popularity Award, the next participant with the most votes will receive the award.
4. All entries submitted must be original and cannot infringe on the Intellectual Property Rights of any party. Entrant shall indemnify the organizer against all actions, costs, claims and liabilities in connection with any allegation or claim of infringement of any IPR of any party.
 Plagiarism is strictly prohibited in the event.
5. Entries must not contain pornography; abusive, offensive or hateful imagery or language; harassing or defamatory content.
6.This event is planned and based on the proposal from the winner of the Online Community Event Proposal Competition. The prizes will be paid by Phanta Treasure.
7. The organizer reserves the right to make alterations to the winning design, and may choose not to use in-whole or in-part the winning design.
8. Participants agree to the above rules and regulations when participating in the event. The organizer reserves the right to make final changes, alterations, interpretations, and cancellations to the event.

✨ **參賽與投票資格**
PhantaBear、PhancyPets 持有者

✨**獎項及獎金 **
**評審最愛獎**：1ETH + 8%服飾販售收益
**熊友人氣獎**
第一名：0.5 ETH + 8%服飾販售收益
第二名：0.3 ETH + 8%服飾販售收益

第五名：Phancy Pets 一只

6/22-6/28 ｜評審評選
6/29            ｜公布入圍
6/29-7/3    ｜熊友人氣獎投票
7/4               ｜得獎公布

✨**作品繳交方式與規格**
1. 請依照所提供的帽T、T-shirt、襪子、帽子版型進行設計。版型位置：https://reurl.cc/LmnV04
2. 上傳之檔案名稱請依照：Discord 使用者名稱_類型  e.g. Sam#2223_帽子

✨**評審標準**
專業評審根據以下標準，將遴選出 10 個入圍作品，讓熊友進行人氣投票。
- 主題性 30%

- 構圖與美感 20%

👀  **注意事項：**
1. 電繪、手繪、風格不限，隨參賽者自由發揮。
2. 參賽者可以重複投稿，意即可以同時提出多個參賽作品。不符合格式的作品則將不獲評選。
3. 若人氣獎前五名得獎者與專業評審獎重複，則依序遞補。
4. 參賽作品須為原創，不得抄襲與盜用，或任何有侵犯他人著作權之行為，否則須負起相關賠償責任。
5. 參賽作品不得涉及暴力、色情、侮辱等或其他損及社會善良風俗之行為。
6.此活動以『社區活動提案票選』第一名的企劃做調整，活動獎金將由社區錢包支付。
7.得獎作品將授權予項目方最終修改、製作、販售之權利。
8. 報名比賽即視為同意以上規定，項目方保有最終修改、變更、活動解釋及取消本活動之權利。

🖌️ **2022 PhantaBear Fashion Design Awards**🎨 

Dear Bearos,

PhantaBear Fashion Design Awards are getting into full swing. This is a great opportunity for you to showcase your talents and design skills.
Not only can you win thousands of dollars in prizes but also make your fashion dream come true. Most importantly, the competition will include a panel of celebrity guest judges: Ric, the co-founder of the trendy brand PHANTACi, and Daniel Wong, an internationally renowned designer.

⭐ **Ric - Co-founder of International Fashion Brand PHANTACi**

He and his friend Jay Chou, the mandopop king, jointly created the world-renowned street brand PHANTACi, which partnered with EzekClub to launch the PhantaBear NFT collection with music, art and fashion as the core values. Ric has led international collaboration projects with Disney, Stussy, Nike, Starbucks, etc., and has always been at the forefront of street fashion. As a fashion trend leader, Ric positions and steers the brand tone and voice of PHANTACi, giving the brand vitality. Having survived in the fashion industry and maintained his unshakable position in the past 20 years, Ric believes that simply "being yourself" and not following the crowd is the "true" trend. Ric shares everything he loves in daily life via PHANTACi and provides fashionistas with edgy fashion choices and lifestyle inspirations, encouraging them to pursue their very own styles.

⭐ **Daniel Wong - Genius Celebrity Designer**

Daniel Wong is a renowned Asian Designer. He previously worked for the Alexander McQueen design team, and he was the former head textile designer of Versace. His out-of-ordinary design concepts and ingenious fabric have been recognized by Superstar Lady Gaga, Nicki Minaj as well as other celebrities. Daniel has launched an NFT collection "**The Lochy Clan**", inspired by his childhood living in Scotland, as well as the “never give up” adventurer concept. Recently, we invited him to join our PhantaBear AMA to share stories about his art & fashion journey.

🎨 **PhantaBear 2022 潮流設計大賞**🖌️ 

親愛的熊弟、熊妹，
PhantaBear 潮流設計大賞正如火如荼的進行，這是一個絕佳的機會讓你大展伸手，揮灑你的設計天分。不僅有豐厚的獎金，還能為熊友製作出潮流有型的服飾。最重要的是，給予作品肯定的評審還是業界指標設計人士：潮牌 PHANTACi 總監 Ric、國際知名華裔設計師 Daniel Wong。

⭐ **國際時尚潮牌 PHANTACi 總監 Ric**

與好友流行天王周杰倫共同打造享譽國際的街頭品牌 PHANTACi，並發起以音樂、藝術、潮流為價值核心的 PhantaBear。曾主導過與 Disney、Stussy、Nike 、Starbucks 等國際性的合作項目，始終走在潮流指標最前端，身為趨勢領導者的 Ric 清楚定位 PHANTACi 的中心思想與調性，賦予品牌生命力。能在街頭品牌的洪流中站穩腳步、鞏固近 20 年來屹立不搖的地位，Ric 認為「做自己」不隨波逐流才是「真」潮流，想透過品牌分享日常生活喜愛的一切，給喜歡流行文化的朋友們更前衛的選擇和生活啟發。

⭐ **「印花鬼才」設計師- Daniel Wong**

享譽盛名的國際知名華裔設計師 Daniel Wong，曾任 Alexander McQueen 的設計團隊、Versace 首席視覺設計師，他獨具匠心的設計理念及巧奪天工的面料受到 Lady Gaga、Nicki Minaj 等時尚名人的高度讚賞；Daniel 更結合自身在蘇格蘭長大的背景及永不放棄的冒險探索家精神，創造出首個個人NFT 「**The Lochy Clan**」，並近期受 PhantaBear 的邀請，分享在藝術與時尚間穿梭的探索之旅。

🎨 **2022 PhantaBear Fashion Design Awards**🖌️

Dear Bearos🐻,
    
Time is running out! Submit your best work to the 2022 PhantaBear Fashion Design Awards before the final deadline on 21 June. **Jay Chou** will keep an eye on this event. Don’t miss this unique opportunity! Today, we would like to share more with you about the Mandopop megastar Jay Chou. On top of being a  global star of stage and screen, he is also one of the world's fastest-rising art collectors.


Dubbed as the “King of Mandopop,” the Taiwanese singer-songwriter, actor and film director, is not only a sensation in the entertainment industry but also known as one of the familiar faces at international art events. Jay has also collaborated with Sotheby’s to become Sotheby's Asia's first auction curator. Sotheby’s described Jay as an avid art collector who is well known for incorporating elements of fine art, poetry and classical styles into his work. His Instagram account is where he shares his love for art and also acts as a window into his collection. You can clearly see his passion for collecting and the wide range that his artistic interest spans across. His unique artistic talent and creative spirit were spurred by his mother, an art teacher to whom he attributes his lifelong passion for art. Jay believes in the power of art — a medium of expression that sees no boundary or limitation. Art lives around us, and it should be appreciated and taken further into our lives. So Jay often infuses art into music and magic, inspiring the collision between art, music and entertainment. He wishes to share the powerful feelings and deep connections art brings as he thinks that “collecting is about sharing, and the more the merrier.” His mission is to continue bringing his love for art into the public realm and expand people’s understanding and appreciation of art.

🎨**PhantaBear 2022 潮流設計大賞**🖌️

親愛的熊弟、熊妹 🐻，

你上傳參賽作品了嗎~或是打算到最後一刻才提交呢？不要忘記截止日期是 <t:1655784300:d> 唷！此次比賽的評審都是時尚潮流界的領導者，將會給你最專業的評點。最驚喜的是，Phantabear 的宣傳大使也會欣賞熊友的設計喔！👀千萬不要錯過這千載難逢的機會啊！今天還想和熊麻吉們分享亞洲樂壇傳奇**周杰倫**的另一個身分- 藝術收藏家：

作為一位知名音樂家、創作歌手、演員、導演，周杰倫對大眾的影響力是無窮的，近幾年他是頂級藝術博覽會的常客，更受邀蘇富比邀請，成為 Sotheby's 亞洲首場的策展人。如果你關注他的 Instagram 帳號，你會發現他的日常生活經常與藝術品相伴，亞洲50大收藏家陳泰銘曾大讚周董的藝術收藏品味獨步亞洲歌壇，擁有大量珍貴的現代、當代藝術品收藏，甚至充滿價值的畢卡索真跡，也都是杰倫的私藏。杰倫的藝術收藏品味獨特，敏銳的直覺來自本身也是藝術創作者，他獨特的藝術天分更是受擔任過美術老師的母親葉惠美女士所影響。杰倫認為藝術存在於我們所有人的生活中，生活的每一刻都在給予他藝術的靈感，他也經常把藝術藏品融入音樂、魔術當中，激發藝術、音樂及娛樂之間的相互碰撞。杰倫熱愛和深信藝術的力量，擁有強烈的使命感，想和歌迷朋友分享藝術帶來的震撼與感動，希望讓大家都能享受每天就在我們身邊的藝術。

🎶 PhantaBear 主題音樂會：「彩虹之夜LGBT+Pride」🎶 

性取向不是二元論、不是非黑即白，而是像彩虹光譜一樣，有各種各樣的性取向。而本週我們要來唱關於所有人的歌，特別是那些在彩虹光譜上曾經被人忽視的歌。從前，只要你不是異性戀，你有很大的機會遭遇歧視⋯⋯但時代不同了，我們也要學會包容各種各樣不同的人們，許多歌手也創作了很多美麗動人的歌，歌頌那些與眾不同的愛情。就讓我們大家一起來聽聽看吧！

🎶Weekly Singing Activity： Sharing “Night of Rainbow 🌈 LGBT+Pride”🎶 

Sexual orientation is not a simple question, the answer is not always A or B. It’s more like the rainbow spectrum, filled with lots of different colours. This week we are going to sing about everyone, especially for those who had been unseen on the rainbow spectrum. Long time ago, there’s a big chance you’ll get bullied if you are not “straight”…… But the time is different now! We have to learn how to accept others. Lot’s of beautiful songs out there singing about those special love stories. Let’s take some time to hear it out!

Please share your story with us, come to <#968960141959508119> channel to discuss with bear singers, we’ll save a spot for you to be on the stage with us. 🤖**New bots have arrived** 🤖
NFT space is moving so fast that it's natural in such a market to feel overwhelmed and that you are missing out. Powerful tools are recommend to use in order to prevent chase high and increase the efficiency of our trading. Therefore PhantaBear Community has decided to bring in the bot system developed by NFTgo for Bearos and Bearsis to use. There is 5 types of Alert ping Bots and 6 types of Command Bots.

Alert ping Bots: 
1. Block-Trades-Alert: You will receive alerts on the trading info that is more than 5ETH.
2. Whale-Trade-Alert: You will receive alerts when whales have trading activities.
3. Daily-Drop-Alert: You will receive alerts on the daily drop info.
4. Top-Mint-15m-Alert: You will receive alerts on the project info with the largest mint activities in the past 15 minutes.
5. Whale-Mint-15m-Alert: You will receive alerts on the project info with the largest whale mint activities in the past 15 minutes.

Command Bots:
1. Check the complete data of a collection: /collection ${slug}
e.g. type /collection art-blocks to check the basic data of ArtBlocks.
2. Check floor price of a collection: /floor ${slug}
e.g. type /floor cryptopunksto check the floor price of CryptoPunks.
3. Check address data: /address ${eth address}
e.g. type /address 0xe052113bd7d7700d623414a0a4585bcae754e9d5to ceck the data of the ETH address.
4. You can also check by ENS domain like /address nftgoio.eth.
5. Check the rarity of an NFT: /rarity-by-collection ${slug} ${token id}
e.g. type /rarity-by-collection cryptopunks 123to check the rarity of CryptoPunks #123.
6. Check the current ETH gas price (Datasource: Etherscan): /gas

NFTgo is one of the very well-known NFT aggregation platform that provide various sources of data.  Other than that, it also provide Chinese language support. Bearos and Bearsis can use this opportunity to make good use of NFTgo. 
DYOR~  :Alarm:

🤖**社區新機器人報到**🤖
身處在資訊爆炸的NFT市場中，必須妥善利用輔助工具的歸納，提升交易效率，並減少錯失恐懼症(FOMO)的產生，導致追高賠錢出場。PhantaBear社群決定引入NFTgo所開發的警示機器人，使熊弟熊妹能夠用簡單的指令獲得複雜的資訊，以下為本次部屬的五種警示機器人與六種指令機器人。

警示機器人 ：
1. Block-Trades-Alert：此機器人將會警示5ETH以上的交易訊息。
2. Whale-Trade-Alert：當鯨魚進行交易活動，將會收到提示。
3.Daily-Drop-Alert: 您將收到有關每日新發項目的警報
4.Top-Mint-15m-Alert：接收過去15分鐘內最火熱的mint活動提示。
5. Whale-Mint-15m-Alert：接收過去15分鐘內鯨魚帳號mint最多的項目提示。

指令機器人 ：
1./collection ${slug} ：獲得所選項目相關資訊。
2./floor ${slug}：獲得現時所選項目地板價格。
3./address ${eth address or ENS domain}：獲得此ETH地址的相關資訊。
4./rarity-by-collection ${slug} ${token id}：獲得此Token ID的稀有度排名。
5./gas：獲得ETH現時gas訊息。

NFTgo為世界聞名的NFT數據分析網站，除了有強力的機器人功能外，更提供了中文語言的支援，有興趣的熊弟熊妹皆可以妥善利用此工具。DYOR~  :Alarm:

Phanta Radio EP4 📻
PhantaTravel First Station - Malaysia

Selemat Datang ke Malaysia. (Welcome to Malaysia)

Malaysia is a multi-ethnic and multi-cultural country in Southeast Asia. In this episode, We will introduce some famous foods in Malaysia, including nasi lemak, roti canai, chicken rice, laksa, char kuey teow, satay & etc. Some of the cuisines are result of acculturation and assimilation of the local culture. Let’s go together to visit dynamic cities, beautiful beaches, idyllic islands and national parks with wildlife-packed rainforests via Phanta Radio.

We've invited some Bearos from Malaysia to join the podcast to share about local culture, food and tourism. We also welcome you to come on stage to share your Malaysia travel experiences. Let's all enjoy the podcast together this coming Sunday!

Phanta Radio熊熊電台 EP4 📻
熊熊旅行團第一站 – 馬來西亞

「Selamat Datang ke Malaysia (歡迎來到馬來西亞)」。

馬來西亞是一個多元種族文化的東南亞國家。在這期電台節目裡，我們將會分享馬來西亞當地美食，這包括了椰漿飯、印度煎餅、雞飯、叻沙、炒粿條、沙爹和許多令人垂涎三尺的美食。馬來西亞美食融合了當地獨有的地方文化。除此之外，讓我們一起空中漫遊當地充滿活力的城市，美麗的沙灘島嶼，和擁有野生動物的熱帶雨林國家公園。

我們邀請了來自馬來西亞的熊弟熊妹來和我們聊聊馬來西亞的地方文化，美食和旅遊經驗。我們也歡迎你們上台跟我們分享你的大馬旅遊經驗。這個禮拜熊熊電台與你們不見不散～

🎶 PhantaBear 主題音樂會：「七夕情人節」🎶 

牛郎與織女的愛情故事被華人傳頌千年，牛郎與織女在銀河兩端盼望著七夕的到來，他們每年只有七夕這天可以乘著鵲橋相見。

你有沒有什麼動人的愛情故事呢？什麼樣的歌曲讓你回想起曾經的那段戀情？又有什麼歌曲是你想唱給另一半聽的呢？讓熊熊社區陪你一起度過七夕，一起沈浸在愛裡吧！

🎉 **__社區貼圖大賽__**🎉 

社區貼圖大賽現在開啟徵稿了！歡迎所有持有者參與，大家可以用PhantaBear為模板創作或手繪進行創作發揮創意。 獎品豐厚！

本次活動徵集PhantaBear為主題的表情和貼圖，在此先介紹一下兩者的區別。

A. 表情(emoji)：尺寸較小，規格為108x108。如<:PHB:980518746261176340> <a:PhantaBear10000_idle:997513876008620122> 皆為表情。

B. 貼圖(sticker）：尺寸較大，規格為320x320。每個sticker為單獨發送，因為尺寸較大可以有更豐富的表達空間。

-- ▶️ 1. 時間線--


徵集投稿時間 ：即日起- <t:1662429600:F>
內部篩選稿件 (10天左右)： <t:1663293600:F> 前篩選整理完畢
社區投票時間（5天）：<t:1663725600:F>結束投票

-- ▶️ 2.比賽規則--

從以下幾個主題中選取關鍵詞進行表情包創作。可提交單個表情包，也可提交整套，作品數量沒有上限。如果有其它創意，提交時可選擇“其它”選項並填寫描述。

A.表情(108x108)主题列表：

1.GM
2.GN
3.WEN
4.HOH
5.思考
6.摸頭
7.比心
8.得意的扭動

B.贴图(320x320)主题列表：

1. GM
2. 拍桌子
3. 尷尬
4. STOP
5. 驚恐
6. 鐳射眼的熊
7. 乾杯/敬奶茶的熊
8. 致敬新專輯的熊

-- ▶️ 3. 評審規則--


藝術性：作品整體的協調性，配色和美觀。
工藝：手繪作品會有加分。動圖有加分。
主題性：是否和phantabear相關。文字類作品會考慮配色與風格。
實用性：貼圖是否符合熊友的日常使用習慣。
趣味性：是否有讓人眼前一亮的亮點。


-- ▶️ 4.格式要求--


A.Sticker
- 320 * 320 pixels
- 建議透明背景
- 靜態圖為PNG格式，動圖為APNG格式（⚠️注意：不支持gif等）
- <512KB

B.Emoji
-108*108 pixels
- <256 KB
- 支持PNG，JEPG，GIF格式

-- ▶️ 5.评奖方式--

經過Admin/Mod團隊會進行基本的篩選，然後將開通兩個頻道，讓社區投出最終的贏家：

頻道1: 提交整套表情包（8個sticket/8個emoji）的選手可以參與角逐“最佳人氣獎”。我們將呈現整套表情包，由社區投票決定整套表情的排名。

頻道2: 社區為單個作品打分，每個主題/動詞（共16個）下的參賽作品也會由社區投票評選出最佳作品。角逐“最佳主題獎”。

- 如果某個主題/動詞只有一位參與者提交，如果點贊數量達到總投票數的平均值則可獲得獎品。

- 為了避免所有人集中創作同一種表情包（例如GM，GN），我們決定採取的是每個主題評選出一位獲勝者的方式，鼓勵大家創作不同主題的表情包。我們會開表單同步顯示提交數據（每個主題有多少人提交），方便大家挑選創作主題。

- “其它”主題可以有＞１位贏家，根據“其它”分類的投稿數量決定。歡迎大家發揮創意

— ▶️ 6.奖励分配 —

奖励预算将被用作提供一下奖项,总預算为1.5 eth左右，如果出现投稿主题空缺会适当下调预算。

 1. “最具人气奖”

Sticker和Emoji两个分类中，我们为投稿全套作品的创作者开设了特殊评选投票通道，得票最高几位的可获得“最具人气奖”并分别获得以下奖品。(共8名）

第一名：0.4 eth 或 杰伦演唱会票一张 或400%魔术熊熊一只
第二名：0.2 eth 或 400%磨砂金熊一只
第三名：0.1 eth 或 200% 魔术熊一只
第四名: 一年nitro会员

2. “最佳主题奖”

我们也为制作单个表情包的参赛者设置了奖项。每个主題最高票数的赢家获得我们的鼓励奖“最佳主题奖”（16名左右），奖品如下：

一个月Nitro会员+Sticker Artist身份组。

我们将在所有最佳主题奖获奖者中抽取一位追加0.1eth的奖金或200%磨砂金熊。

注: 同一人可在不同主題多次获奖，如获得多个nitro会员可指定给朋友或放弃。如最佳作品奖获奖者获得奖品，顺位给下一位票数最多的。

如部分熊公仔库存告急，可指定兑换同价位其它款式的熊。

**__🎉 Community Emoji/Sticket Contest🎉 __**

This contest is accepting submissions of both emoji and sticker. Let’s clarify the difference between emoji and sticker in advance. 

A. Emoji：Emoji is smaller in size with a dimension of 108x108 px. Eg <:PHB:980518746261176340> <a:PhantaBear10000_idle:997513876008620122> are examples of emoji.

B. Sticker：Stickers are larger in size with a dimension of 320x320 px. They can not be send along with text, but you may include finer details in sticker due to its larger dimension.

Collecting Entries ：Now- <t:1662429600:F>

--▶️ Rules--

Please select one of the theme below to start your creation process. There are different themes available for sticker vs emoji. There is no upper limit in the number of submissions you make. 

If you want to submit other ideas, simply choose the “other” category in the form and enter your description.

--▶️ Judging Criteria--

Artistry: the overall concordance, coloring and visual of the work

Effort: we give extra points to original hand-drawn work (drawing pad) and animated work. 

Theme: Whether the work is related to PhantaBear. For text-centric work we will consider the coloring and style.

Usefulness: Will this emoji/sticker be used in daily conversation. 

Fun: impress us.

--▶️ Submission Format--


A.Sticker
- 320 * 320 pixels
- Transparent background recommended
- Static image shall be in PNG format，Animation shall be in APNG format.（⚠️ Note: gif is not supported）
- <512KB 

B.Emoji
-108 * 108 pixels
- <256 KB
- PNG，JEPG，GIF formats are supported

--▶️ Picking the Winners--

We will open up two channels for community voting.

Channel 1: For those who have submitted the full set (8 stickers/8 emoji), you may compete for the "community's favorite" award. We will present the full set in the channel and those will be evaluated as a whole by the community. Winners will be ranked based on community voting.

Channel 2: For those who have not submitted the full set, you may compete for the "best theme award". After initial screening by Admin/Mod team, we will ask the community to vote for the best work for each theme, which emoji/sticker can be voted individually.

To prevent everyone from submitting same type of emoji/sticker (Eg gm, gm). We would like to encourage people to go for different theme by rewarding one winner from each theme. We will open up a form and update in live how many submissions there are for each theme to facilitate the process. 

If there is only one submission for a certain theme, then the contestant will be rewarded if it has gotten more then the average vote across board.

We may have multiple winners from the “other” category depending on the number and quality of submission. Stay creative. 

—▶️ Prize Distribution—

The budget will be used to purchase prize/distribute eth reward. We estimate that our budge will be around 1.5 eth.

 1. For Sticker/Emoji，We have set the “Community’s favorite” award for those who have submitted the entire set of emoji/sticker(8). There will be two set of winners, one for the sticker category and one for the emoji category. Since some prefer eth reward and some prefer physical prize, we offer the participants the options below: （2*4 total winners）

First place：0.4 eth OR Singapore concert ticket OR 400% Phantabear Magician

Second Place：0.2 eth OR 400% Phantabear Gold

Third Place：0.1 eth OR 200% Phantabear Gold

Fourth Place: one year of discord nitro

2. We also have set up the “best theme award” for those who did not submit the entire set of emoji/sticker. Those who get the highest number of vote for each them will be awarded:

One month of Discord Nitro+ Sticker Artist Role。

**Phanta Radio熊熊電台 EP7 📻**
*熊熊旅行團第二站 – 紐約*
紐約市，通稱紐約，位於美國紐約州南端，為美國人口最多的城市、紐約都會區的核心、以及世界最大的城市之一，是對全球的經濟、商業、金融、媒體、政治、教育和娛樂具有極大影響力的國際大都會。紐約還被稱為「美國文化之都」，與倫敦、香港合稱「紐倫港」。
在文化底蘊如此深厚的城市裡，將會帶給我們哪些驚豔的美食和旅遊景點呢？我們邀請了來自紐約的熊弟熊妹來和我們聊聊紐約的地方文化，美食和旅遊經驗。我們也歡迎你們上台跟我們分享你的紐約旅遊經驗。這個禮拜熊熊電台與你們不見不散～

**Phanta Radio EP7📻 **
*PhantaTravel 2nd station - New York City*
New York City, commonly known as "The Big Apple", is located in the southern tip of the state of New York, USA. **Phanta Radio EP10**📻
*PhantaTravel 3rd station – Cambodia*
Cambodia is a country located in the southern portion of the Mainland Southeast Asia. Cambodia has a tropical monsoon climate of two seasons, and the country is made up of a central floodplain around the Tonlé Sap lake and Mekong Delta, surrounded by mountainous regions. Angkor Wat Temple is one of Cambodia’s most beautiful attractions and it is designated as a World Heritage Site.
What kind of amazing food and tourist attractions will this country with such a profound cultural heritage bring us? We've invited some Bearos from Cambodia to join the podcast to share about local culture, food and tourism. We also welcome you to come on stage to share your Cambodia travel experiences. Let's all enjoy the podcast together this coming Sunday!
＊Stay tuned on PhantaRadio, Bear DJ with Bearos will bring an unique topic to you on a weekly basis!

**Phanta Radio熊熊電台 EP10 📻**
*熊熊旅行團第三站 – 柬埔寨*
柬埔寨是一個位於東南亞大陸南部的國家。柬埔寨有兩個季節的熱帶季風氣候。該國由洞裏薩湖和湄公河三角洲周圍的中央洪泛區組成，周圍環繞著山區。吳哥窟是柬埔寨著名的旅遊景點同時也被指定為世界遺產之一。
在文化底蘊如此深厚的城市裡，將會帶給我們哪些驚豔的美食和旅遊景點呢？我們邀請了來自柬埔寨的熊弟熊妹來和我們聊聊柬埔寨的地方文化，美食和旅遊經驗。我們也歡迎你們上臺跟我們分享你的柬埔寨旅遊經驗。這個禮拜熊熊電臺與你們不見不散～

🐻**PetaRush x PhantaBear AMA**🐻

PetaRush 是一款創新的 Web3 賽跑遊戲，主打「跨 IP 遊玩」、「跨鏈賦能」與「跨 IP 繁殖」三大特色。玩家不需要操控方向，只需要在賽跑時策略性地施放技能來獲得勝利。玩家可以透過「角色養成」與「技能養成」來增加跑者的數值，獲得更高的勝率。遊戲也支援「贏賺」的功能，玩家可以將賺到的 Peta token 兌換成 MSU，在交易所進行交易。每個遊戲角色都是一款 NFT，每個 NFT 都自帶專屬的 BGM，當玩家獲得冠軍時，全場將會響起冠軍專屬的配樂，如同 John Cena 的出場！一起來參與這個全球第一款自帶 BGM x 跨 IP 遊玩的區塊鏈遊戲吧！

**Phanta Radio EP16📻 
PhantaTravel 4th station - Chicago**
Chicago is the third-most populous city in United State in terms of gross domestic product, after New York City and Los Angeles. It is located in the central part of the North America,  playing an important role in railway and air hub, as well as one of the major financial, futures and commodity trading centers in the United States. Since Chicago was found in 1837, the city has grown over the past 100 years to become one of the most influential metropolises in the world.
What kind of amazing food and tourist attractions will this city with such a profound cultural heritage bring us? We've invited the top dog from U.S.A - Sophie to join the podcast and share about local culture, food and tourism. We also welcome you to come on stage to share your travel experiences in Chicago. Let's all enjoy the podcast together this coming Sunday!

**Phanta Radio熊熊電台 EP16 📻
熊熊旅行團第四站 – 芝加哥**
芝加哥是美國大都市生產總值的第三大城市，僅次於紐約和洛杉磯。其地處北美大陸的中心地帶，為美國重要的鐵路、航空樞紐，也是美國主要的金融、期貨和商品交易中心之一。自1837年建市以來，經過一百多年的發展，逐漸成為具有世界影響力的大都市之一。
在文化底蘊如此深厚的城市裡，將會帶給我們哪些驚豔的美食和旅遊景點呢？我們邀請了美國扛霸子熊友Sophie來和我們聊聊芝加哥這個富庶的城市、美食和旅遊經驗。我們也歡迎你們上臺跟我們分享你的芝加哥旅遊經驗。這個禮拜熊熊電臺與你們不見不散～

自 2009 年以來，SMG 一直是您在過去 12 年中一直信賴的趨勢前沿品牌。 從一個生活方式標籤開始，即使在日常生活的磨礪中也能識別壓力時刻和易變的本質，不斷發展並喚起一代充滿激情的都市人。 我們已經從一個服裝品牌轉變為為您帶來時尚生活產品、露營裝備以滿足您在 web3 世界中的需求。

我們進軍 web3 世界的初衷是希望志同道合的品牌和朋友能夠更好地了解 SMG 作為一個品牌和我們的信念。 科技的進步為虛擬世界的擴張鋪平了道路，我們希望在其中不斷前進，探索和拓展新的可能性和機會，讓品牌不斷成長。 通過我們的第一個 web3 項目，我們希望發展 SMG，為社區建立一個安全的避難所，以便在一個新的、積極的環境中更好地了解彼此。 這也是我們在第一個項目中選擇與 Graycraft 合作的原因。

GRAYCRAFT 是一個 NFT 社區，它正在為 Web3 世代構建 #Mech3 機甲世界。 誕生於 GREY®️，一個以其尖端設計和未來主義方法而聞名的奢侈品牌，作為第一個與 Trezor 合作創建世界上第一個豪華加密硬件錢包。 2021 年，GRAYCRAFT 成立，打造 GRAYCRAFT 宇宙，這是一部多維度的科學奇幻史詩故事，講述了人類滿足最宏大的野心並迎接最史詩級的挑戰。 GRAYCRAFT 宇宙的核心就是 The Omega Project，也是 Web3 世代的 #Mech3機甲世界。

JOINING THE JOURNEY 一起加入這個旅程
憑藉共同的信念和路線圖，我們看到了這兩個品牌如何合作的巨大潛力，以及向這個遙遠的宇宙的激動人心的飛躍。 這是迄今為止的旅程，合作即將啟動。

GRAYCRAFT Mechs (including GCSMG)
Creating the multidimensional mech 3.0 project for the web3 community.

Launching: November 2022
Quantity: 8,888 (GCSMG 1,160)
推出時間：2022年11月
數量：總數8,888 (其中包含GCSMG機甲 1,160個)

THE LAUNCH OF GCSMG 即將來臨
SMG聖戰士之甦醒 將喚來宇宙之平衡 希望與正義隨發跡。
總數 1,160 - 當中包含 SMG聖騎士 及 皇室 兩種。


與我們一起進入GRAYCRAFT宇宙，未來的路無限可能。
